hero.title: Welcome to Tokyo Vegan!
hero.description: Become part of the vibrant bilingual community empowering plant-based living throughout Tokyo and across Japan.
hero.communityBlurb: Tokyo Vegan Meetup has welcomed vegans, vegetarians, flexitarians, and the vegan-curious since 2006. We celebrate bilingual storytelling and practical resources that make compassionate living accessible to everyone.
